SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.model.persistence

Class PersonDAO

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.model.persistence.PersonDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
OperationsDAO
public class PersonDAO extends Object implements OperationsDAO
This class represents a Data Access Object as PersonDAO for managing PersonDTO, it implements the OperationsDAO interface to provide operations for creating, displaying and sorting person records.
Author:
Juan Esteban Quintero, Juan Pablo Urrego

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonDAO

      public PersonDAO()
      Default constructor for the PersonDAO class. Initializes the listPerson and copy linked list. Link both linked list with the file that contains the information.

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile()
      Writes the current state of listPerson and copy to a serialized file.

    • create

      public void create(PersonDTO person)
      Creates a new person record in both listPerson and copy. If the person's id is less than 2, the record is added before the last element.
      Specified by:
      create in interface OperationsDAO
      Parameters:
      person - The personDTO object representing the person to be created.

    • show

      public String show()
      Returns a string representation of the original list of person records.
      Specified by:
      show in interface OperationsDAO
      Returns:
      A string containing information about all the persons in the original list.

    • showAgeOrder

      public String showAgeOrder()
      Returns a string representation of the sorted list of person records by age.
      Specified by:
      showAgeOrder in interface OperationsDAO
      Returns:
      A string containing information about persons, sorted by age.
